name: Symergy_V2
description:
Symergy is a Die and Retry Platformer where the world follows one specific rule: As above, so below. You control a character who can switch between the light world above and the dark one below. All the actions performed in one world may echo distinctively on the other. Outsmart traps and fight monsters in a thrilling adventure to collect all five Emerald Tablet Fragments.  Sad about Itch.io not resolving bug that deleted our real build for the Epic mega jam...

Controls:

[QD]    to move left and right

[SPACE]    to jump [L.SHIFT]    to dash [A]    to attack [TAB]    to Switch World [ESCAPE]    to pause menu You can also play with a gamepad, and there is settings menu for keybinding.
